text:
Anyone else afraid that he won't win the #CARecall #RecallGavinNewsom attempt (#VoteNoOnTheRecall!!) but then will launch a bid for the @GOP 2024 primary nomination? 

Begging @TheDemocrats & @JoeBiden to provide *something* to The People to avert such a horrifying scenario. https://t.co/SxzBlpanVv
